achievement.name: DCC Demo Badge
achievement.description: This is a demo credential issued to demonstrate the functionality of Verifiable Credentials for wallets and verifiers.

criteria.narrative:
Verifiable Credentials:
- use linked-data with contextual vocabularies so that they are human and machine readable, 
- can represent achievements such as degrees, micro-credentials, certificates, and licenses
- are digitally signed when issued and this makes them more tamper-evident & trustworthy,
- can be stored in digital wallets, 
- can be issued to decentralized identifiers (DIDs) that are managed by wallets, 
- can be presented to verifiers who will verify that the credential data hasn't changed since it was issued, 
- and that the earner presenting the credential controls the DID that it was issued to.
